attributes.action: Lower amount of e petions and signatures
attributes.additional_details: Reform this e petion site nobody stands a fighting chance with over 5700+ e petions to look through, lower e petions to 50 or 100, also change signatures from 100,000 to 25,000 as statistics show in america they require 100,000 signatures here we should only require 25,000 due to UK population.
